about_the_game:
Relentless enemies, intense combat, Massive NSFW content.


Fairies were living peacefully in a certain forest.
However, an attacker appears and the heroine, Tiki, is taken prisoner along with her friends.
Luckily, Tiki escapes and battles various enemies in order to save her friends.


　■Feature　

1. real-time "NSFW" and a variety of situations
This title contains many "sexual combat" in which NSFW occurs during battle.
When an enemy's restraining technique is eaten, a special animation is played, and if the player is defeated, a large-screen animation and CG are displayed, which vary depending on the cause of the defeat.
With a total of more than 20 enemy characters, you can enjoy a vast amount of "NSFW" and a variety of situations.

2. Challenging gameplay
The enemies you face are merciless, so trial and error is key to victory.
Enjoy the above "NSFW" as you accumulate defeats.
An "Easy Mode" is also available for those who are not good at games.

3. simple operation and input
Although this is a fighting game, there is no need to input complicated commands.
A variety of attacks can be performed with simple operations.


　■About this game　

This is a remake of the game "Fairy Fighting" created and published by the indie developer "Eluku" between 2009 and 2015.
It is back by a different author with a new game engine and many new elements.
A gallery mode has been added, the controls have been simplified, the difficulty level has been adjusted... There are many other new elements and changes.
You will enjoy the new "Fairy Fighting" !

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are 20 years of age or older.
This game contains adult content. (nudity, sex without consent, tentacles, bestiality, childbirth)

name: Fairy Fighting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 2D fighting game. In order to save her friends, the heroine Tiki fights "relentless enemies". If defeated, she will suffer terrible consequences.
